name: Slow Cooker 3-Bean Chili
author: lmyrato
summary: This is so easy and so tasty. Freezes great for meals later in the week. If you want it a little thinner add an extra can of tomato sauce. Also the green chiles are not hot but add a wonderful flavor, so don't be afraid of them.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15.5 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can reduced-sodium black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Cook and stir turkey in a large skillet until completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes; transfer to slow cooker
Stir tomatoes, tomato sauce, pinto beans, kidney beans, black beans, onion, green chilies, chili powder, garlic, oregano, and cumin with the turkey in the slow cooker
Cook on High for 4 hours or on Low for 7 hours
